message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $950000. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to consider the value I've put into this product. I can do $825000, which is a compromise between our initial offers. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above the target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be at $775000 or lower. Can you consider this revised offer?

I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob, but I need to make a bit more than that. I can do $810000, which is a fair price considering the value of the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to go up to $795000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you consider this revised offer?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I still think this product is worth more than $795000. I can do $820000, which is a fair price considering its value. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I can do $790000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you consider this revised offer?
I'm willing to make one last compromise, Bob. I can do $815000, which is the closest I can get to my minimum price without going over. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at a price I'm comfortable with. My final offer is $790000. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to consider other options.
